ingredients.item: 1 Waitrose Duchy Organic Courgette, sliced lengthways
2 medium Waitrose Duchy Organic British Free
1 Waitrose Duchy Organic Wholemeal Muffin With Seeds & Oats, halved and toasted
1 tbsp Waitrose Duchy Organic Soft Cheese
1 tbsp Simply Delicious Organic Garlic Mayonnaise

instructions.step: Brush the courgette slices with a little oil and griddle for 4-5 minutes turning once until softened. Meanwhile, cook the kale in boiling water for 5 minutes and drain well.
Poach the eggs in a saucepan of boiling water to your liking.
Spread the muffin with the soft cheese, top with the kale and courgettes then the eggs. Spoon over the mayo, season and serve.
